dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Why do you wander into the domain of the undead, insignificant being?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no quarrel, I am merely passing through.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your misguided bravery will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can leave if it offends you, I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your feeble attempt at diplomacy is amusing. Prepare for the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will retreat, I do not wish to provoke further conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your cowardice does not grant you safety. Prepare to face the wrath of the undead!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to back down, let us see who triumphs in battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well, your defiance shall be met with destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to fight, but I will defend myself if need be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your hollow words carry no weight. Prepare to face the might of the undead!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stand my ground and face whatever comes.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery in the face of inevitable defeat. A futile display.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a chance to cease this aggression and find common ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Common ground with the living is nonexistent. Prepare for your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge your power and seek only passage without conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Acknowledgment without submission, a dangerous game you play.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no disrespect, I will depart from this place immediately.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your departure will not save you now. Face the fate you have brought upon yourself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If conflict is your desire, then let us settle this here and now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A willing adversary. The outcome is already decided.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have business to attend to in these lands, I do not fear the likes of you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a fragile being. Your arrogance will be your undoing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no interest in quarreling, but I will not yield either.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A defiance that will be crushed under the weight of the undead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I choose to retreat, there is no honor in needless bloodshed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Honor amongst the living means nothing to the dead. Your retreat changes nothing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If battle is inevitable, then let us test each other's strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength alone will not save you from the darkness that awaits.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to provoke conflict, but I will defend myself if provoked.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defensive words from one who stands on the precipice of ruin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will defend myself with honor and courage.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Honor and courage in the face of oblivion. A futile gesture.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us lay down arms and find a way to coexist peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace with the living is a foreign concept. The end approaches.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge your power, but I will not bow to tyranny.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Acknowledgment in defiance. A rare display of foolishness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will depart from this place, but know that I do so out of respect, not fear.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect from the living is as fleeting as their lives. Prepare for your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If conflict is inevitable, then let fate decide the victor.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fate has already sealed your demise. The time for choices is over.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge the forces of darkness, including you, if necessary.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenger with feeble resolve. Your bravado will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not engage in unnecessary conflict, but I will not cower either.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An empty declaration from one who treads the path to oblivion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I opt to retreat, there is no glory in futile battles.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Glory and futility hold no meaning in the presence of death. Prepare for your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If battle is what you seek, then battle you shall have.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A willing combatant marching towards certain destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not seek conflict, but I will stand my ground against tyranny.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resistance without understanding. A common trait among the doomed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stand firm and face any challenge with valor.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Valor in the face of oblivion. A fleeting notion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us cease hostilities and seek a path to mutual understanding.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding with the living is a luxury you cannot afford. Embrace your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge your strength, but I will not submit to darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Acknowledgment in defiance. The epitome of folly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I choose to depart, not out of fear but out of wisdom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom in the face of annihilation. A futile gesture.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If conflict is unavoidable, then let the clash of powers decide the outcome.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The clash will herald your end, for darkness knows no mercy.
